article_title: Roanoke River mostly clean enough to dip your toes
article_text:
Print Subscriber Access (non 7-day)

CURRENT SUBSCRIBERS: Add unlimited access to our digital content, including roanoke.com and our eTimes, to your current print subscription for just $1.99 for the first month.

The $1.99 will be billed to your credit card immediately by PayPalPro. After the first month, your total susbscription price will be $15.47 per month.

og.description: Q. As we [Roanoke River] Greenway users are far more aware of the river and since it floods and makes its presence known as both a treasure and the occasional threat, I have been more and more drawn to dip my feet in. So how clean is it? How clean was it 10 and 30 years ago?
